...体液(humours)学说)，他的医学观点对以后西方医学的发展有巨大影响，卒于公元前377年，享年八十三岁，目录1贡献2生平3影响4轶事5观点6箴言7誓言7.1意义7.2原文7.3变革8数学家1贡献希波克拉底提出，体液(humours)学说，，认为人体由血液(blood)、粘液(phlegm)、黄胆(yellow bile)和黑胆(black bile)四种体液组成，这四种体液的不同配合使人们有不同的体质.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English fleem, fleume, from Old French fleume, from late Latin phlegma 'clammy moisture (of the body'), from Greek phlegma 'inflammation', from phlegein 'to burn'. The spelling change in the 16th cent. was due to association with the Latin and Greek

entry.def: Phlegm is the thick yellowish substance that develops in your throat and at the back of your nose when you have a cold.

means.word_mean: 1. apathy demonstrated by an absence of emotional reactions
2. expectorated matter; saliva mixed with discharges from the respiratory passages; in ancient and medieval physiology it was believed to cause sluggishness
3. inactivity; showing an unusual lack of energy
